page.title: 02LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: The D block lies in the county of {Hereford and Worcester}but is located in two districts. The eastern two thirds lie in{Wychavon District}and the western third lies in{Malvern {Hills. The main part of the block lies in two parishes.{Defford}village forms one parish and{ Besford}village forms another. For both ecclesiastical and civil purposes the parishes are administered together. The parish of{Pirton}intrudes on the northern boundary but the area is uninhabited.{Croome Court}is in the parish of{Croome D'Abitot.}This is a redundant parish for all purposes and is included in{Kempsey}.The area of {Dunstall Common}in the south west is in the parish of{Severn Stoke}which is also combined with Kempsey.
